Hi Oleksandr, can you please attach your test case?

Hello, this message has appeared just after each Eclipse startup (during building workspace). After applying some of recent updates it does not appear any more. If it would reappear, I will provide additional information.

Hi Oleksandr,

Resolving this bug.  Please reopen this bug if you encounter this in the future.  Thanks.

Hello, 

do not see any reason to have this bug resolved - I meet this situation on everyday basis. Any advices how to track down situation are very welcome.

Regards,
Oleksandr
Oleksandr, can you attach the XML Schema file (and dependencies) that are causing this issue?  I suspect that you have an invalid file that's causing the XML Schema model to choke.
Hmm.. this one is marked as major.  Can you describe what the side effects of this problem are?  I can't tell from the description given here if this problem meets the definition of 'major'.

Hello,

if only I know this file ... - I have no clue which file it is and how to find it. 

Regards,
Oleksandr

Oleksandr, did you have a copy of Xerces in your JRE/lib/ext folder at the time?  The mentions of com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl indicate the use of a different ciopy of Xerces than we were expecting.

No, I have not and never had. The only lib that I have ever put in JRE/lib/ext is rxtx (to work with COM-ports).

Regards, Oleksandr(In reply to comment #8)
> Oleksandr, did you have a copy of Xerces in your JRE/lib/ext folder at the
> time?  The mentions of
> com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl indicate the use of
> a different ciopy of Xerces than we were expecting.
>
Hmm, ok, that's the one built into JRE 1.5.  Still, that's not a class that should be called from a plug-in.  Can you attach the output of the Configuration details from the About dialog?

(In reply to comment #10)
> Hmm, ok, that's the one built into JRE 1.5.  Still, that's not a class that
> should be called from a plug-in.  Can you attach the output of the
> Configuration details from the About dialog?
> 

Sorry, I has reported this bug more then one year ago and from that time Eclipse version, configuration and so on have changed a lot. Now I do not experience this bug. Have to test on another computer as well, but this a can do tomorrow only.

Regards,
Oleksandr
I'll close this for now as WORKSFORME.
If the issue reappears feel free to re-open with more information.
